entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:21 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to ice pellets or snow at times heavy late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets. Ice pellets with freezing rain in the evening and after midnight and with periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
